body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:

Prometheus graphs with metrics coming from cAdvisor are full of holes. Graphs with metrics coming from Prometheus node exporter are fine.

![graph](https://a.safe.moe/XOSWv.PNG)

**What you expected to happen**:

cAdvisor should return all metrics, all the time.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

```
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx@k8s-master-57301243-0:~$ for host in k8s-master-57301243-1; do echo $host $(sudo curl -s --cert /etc/kubernetes/certs/client.crt --key /etc/kubernetes/certs/client.key https://10.100.195.134/api/v1/nodes/$host:10250/proxy/metrics/cadvisor -k | grep container_memory_usage > /tmp/81.metrics; wc -l < /tmp/81.metrics); done
k8s-master-57301243-1 81
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx@k8s-master-57301243-0:~$ for host in k8s-master-57301243-1; do echo $host $(sudo curl -s --cert /etc/kubernetes/certs/client.crt --key /etc/kubernetes/certs/client.key https://10.100.195.134/api/v1/nodes/$host:10250/proxy/metrics/cadvisor -k | grep container_memory_usage > /tmp/14.metrics; wc -l < /tmp/14.metrics); done
k8s-master-57301243-1 14
```
Here the diff between the time it returned 81 container_memory_usage metrics and 14:

```diff
--- /tmp/14.metrics     2017-08-04 13:32:35.725206519 +0000
+++ /tmp/81.metrics     2017-08-04 13:32:13.096959702 +0000
@@ -1,14 +1,81 @@
 # HELP container_memory_usage_bytes Current memory usage in bytes.
 # TYPE container_memory_usage_bytes gauge
-container_memory_usage_bytes{container_name="POD",id="/kubepods/besteffort/pod8795b3a7e776a594223979e13eef2e88/c6c488ab9ff65a70ec09cb6863bb9b457d3058267477902895ac4614b63d3115",image="gcrio.azureedge.net/google_containers/pause-amd64:3.0",name="k8s_POD_kube-scheduler-k8s-master-57301243-1_kube-system_8795b3a7e776a594223979e13eef2e88_0",namespace="kube-system",pod_name="kube-scheduler-k8s-master-57301243-1"} 45056
-container_memory_usage_bytes{container_name="POD",id="/kubepods/besteffort/pod9cac86a70f5247eba673f5b320242001/a6b681e9e0327f2514292a88af35723716c7019bbb02a8722579ee7ebb1fb209",image="gcrio.azureedge.net/google_containers/pause-amd64:3.0",name="k8s_POD_kube-apiserver-k8s-master-57301243-1_kube-system_9cac86a70f5247eba673f5b320242001_0",namespace="kube-system",pod_name="kube-apiserver-k8s-master-57301243-1"} 45056
```

- Others:

title: cAdvisor returns exclusive parts of metrics randomly
